about_the_game:
Hero Fluffette

A nymphet originally conceived within the Kshira Sagara - the Ocean of Milk, Fluffette came to find herself floundering in the lower realm when she tripped over a haphazard pothole of fragmented space. Her natured being derived from the essence of a hare, Fluffette struggles to keep her stately ears and tail concealed even as she attempts to adopt a human form to facilitate her endeavors in this puzzling realm. Fortunately, due to humanity's eclectic array of attire, her disguise has remained uncompromised thus far. Picking up the human art of small arms usage, Fluffette's marksmanship is as dynamic as it is unpredictable. Woefully entrapped by her hereditary instincts, when threatened, Fluffette invariably succumbs to the urge to burrow to the safety of her personal pocket dimension.

Fluffette becomes airborne when using certain skills. All her skills have both ground and aerial forms.
Upon becoming airborne, aerial form of the skill can be used at will, but the cooldown for dodging and skills will be halted temporarily.
When airborne, performing normal attacks fires downwards with twin pistols, expending pistol energy in the process. Pistol energy is fully recharged upon landing.
When airborne, dodge CD is reset upon normal attacking or using skills.
